title: Meo Watch Face - Moto 360
summary: ★★★★★ Meo watch face cute and clean designed for cat lover (Moto 360 and other).
developerAddress: 119 BIS Building Room 2D23, Floor 2 Phase 3, Mahesak Rd, Suriyawong, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500 Thailand

descriptionHTML:
Meo Watch Face is new designed for Moto 360 on other smart watch (Android Wear).


100% compatible with LG G Watch R and LG Watch Urbane
Compatible with Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony SmartWach 2, Huawei smart watch and basically every watch using android wear round and square shape.

★ Funny moment when someone ask you the time with Auto Flip ★

User review (Japan Language) -> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MnjJWS_k4l4

Note:
Meo Watch Face does NOT work on Samsung Gear and Smart watches using other operating systems.

Features:
✔ Time
✔ AM/PM
✔ Analog and Digital
✔ DIM mode display
✔ New way look with auto flip
✔ Vibrate and face change when alert

Settings:
✔ Auto flip on/off
✔ Custom colors settings
✔ 12 or 24 hour watch display
✔ Hourly alert

INSTALLATION:
- After installing the app on your phone, then you will see Meo watch face in the app "Android Wear".
- Please activate it from your Smart watch (Moto 360 or LG G Watch R) by Long press on the clock then select the Meo watch face.

Please Note
* IF you don't want to get notice about new watch face and new apps please deselect "Notification for new watch face, apps"

Have an any idea to improve the Meo watch face app? Let us know by write review and we'll do our best to make this app better.
Discuss with your idea at https://www.facebook.com/siamcybersoft

[NOTICE]
If you have a question, fill free to contact our email address in English.
Email support on: http://apps.siamcybersoft.com
comments: RGB Color select works great, no ads on watchface Edit: Re: No worries, I haven't used the watch face extensively but it's very nice looking, and I really appreciate that the face doesn't have ads on it.  Highly recommended to anyone considering it. It delivers and looks as good as you think it will.

Cute I love this face on my Zenwatch, but when I have the hourly alert option selected it still shows the time instead of the eyes - which I was most excited about because I thought it was a really cute feature. Otherwise I like this watch face a lot.
Lovely simple look Great simple look but really needs a date on face somewhere, surely not difficult to add. Nice design to use on occasion but i need date
I have android wear. But it doesnt matter cuz app didnt even tried to connect my watch or asked premission. Doesnt work.
Easy to use and love the color options.  Cute and works great on my Moto 360.
